services.object

Class ObjectTransactionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • services.object.ObjectTransactionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ObjectTransactionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This Class is used to periodically save all Objects using transactions to disk. Remember that you still need commit transactions manually whenever an object using transactions is removed from zone i.e. when a player logs out.
    Author:
    Light
